inclusion.criterion: Age greater than or equal to 18
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Lymph node of greater than or equal to 2 cm accessible for biopsy/harvest or greater than 1000/microliters of circulating tumor cells in the blood
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: ECOG performance status of less than or equal to 3
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Adequate major organ function (serum creatinine 1.5 mg/dl or creatinine clearance greater than 60 ml/min; bilirubin less than 2 mg/dl (total) except less than 5 mg/dl in patients with Gilbert's syndrome as defined by greater than 80% unconjugated; ANC greater than 1000 and platelets greater than 100,000)
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: No active symptomatic ischemic heart disease, myocardial infarction or congestive heart failure within the past year. If MUGA is obtained, the LVEF should exceed 40%
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Antibodies to HIV or presence of hepatitis B surface antigen
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has Burkitt's lymphoma with pericardial effusion, but no CNS involvement. However, patient has a history of viral encephalitis/meningitis which may be a contraindication for trial participation.
